byline.contributor: Dirk VanderHart reported from Roseburg, Kirk Johnson from Seattle and Julie Turkewitz from Denver. Reporting was contributed by Richard Pérez-Peña and Timothy Williams from New York, Claire Cain Miller from Roseburg, Ian Lovett from Los Angeles, Jack Healy from Denver, Michael S. Schmidt from Washington and Laura M. Holson from San Francisco.
byline.original: By DIRK VANDERHART, KIRK JOHNSON and JULIE TURKEWITZ

abstract: Gunman Chris Harper-Mercer shoots and kills nine people and wounds seven at Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Ore, before being killed in shootout with police; students report scene of carnage and panic in classroom; police say assailant had three guns, at least one of which was a long gun.
lead_paragraph: Officials said Chris Harper Mercer, 26, went on a shooting rampage in Roseburg, Ore., and that he died after an exchange of gunfire with the police.

headline.main: Oregon Shooting at Umpqua College Kills 10, Sheriff Says
headline.print_headline: Gunman Attacks Oregon College; 10 Reported Dead

snippet: Officials said Chris Harper Mercer, 26, went on a shooting rampage in Roseburg, Ore., and that he died after an exchange of gunfire with the police.
